FAIL_TO_PASS: when help for error then text is on stderr
when help requested then text is on stdout
when "after" string then string after built-in help
when help for error then context.error is true
when help on program then context.command is program
when "beforeAll" on program then is called on subcommand
when help on subcommand and "before" subcommand then context.command is subcommand
when "before" string then string before built-in help
when help on subcommand and "beforeAll" on program then context.command is subcommand
when all the simple positions then strings in order
when "before" function then function result before built-in help
when "afterAll" string then string after built-in help
when "afterAll" on program then is called on subcommand
when help requested then context.error is false
when "beforeAll" string then string before built-in help
